title: Similar to FF DIN
content:
This typeface seems pretty similar to FF DIN, but the weights seem a hair off, and the ascender of the t extends beyond the capline. Am I missing something simple?

author: jpcody

comments.content: The spacing is also pretty bad.
Agreed on the spacing. Had never heard of Parachute before. Interesting to read some information about them previously posted here. Thanks for the spot, akira!
